publ: by Jasco Products - In Wall Smart Dimmer
name: UltraPro
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
If you have any questions about using this skill, contact our U.S.-based consumer care at support@byjasco.com. 

Enjoy voice command of your home lighting through Alexa compatible Echo products. Simply ask Alexa to turn on, turn off or dim the light. 
To connect UltraPro Wi-Fi devices to Alexa:
(1). Download the UltraPro app from the Android or iOS app market
(2). Create an account in the UltraPro app
(3). Install your Wi-Fi device following the instructions provided with your device
(4). Follow the on-screen prompts to pair the device with the UltraPro app
(5). Change the name of the device, which identifies the device in the skill 
(6). Download Amazon Alexa app from the Amazon, Android or iOS app market 
(7). Configure your Echo with the Alexa app
(8). Search "UltraPro" in the Alexa app skills category
(9). Click “enable to use”
(10). When redirected to the UltraPro login page, enter you UltraPro account information 

You can enjoy voice control on your home devices such as:
“Alexa, turn on kitchen light""
“Alexa, turn off kitchen light""
“Alexa, dim living room light""
“Alexa, brighten living room light""
“Alexa, set living room light to 20 percent""
“Alexa, set outdoor lights to blue""

The UltraPro skill supports the following products:
• In-wall smart switch
• In-wall smart dimmer
• In-wall smart receptacle
• Indoor plug-in 1-outlet smart switch
• Indoor plug-in 2-outlet smart switch
• Outdoor plug-in 2-outlet smart switch
• Outdoor 6-outlet smart yard stake
